### Top AI Stories

2. [What Is LLM Hallucination? - AI and Machine Learning Explained](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=enyG3uXydRs)

3. [How Can Prompt Engineering Guide LLM Output? - AI and Machine Learning Explained](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d5xHBWZvlAo)

5. [OpenAI's Big Move Changes Everything!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXTfGgHX6sg)

6. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ Everything I've learned (so far) â€“ Part One â€“ Fine tuning](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381832)

7. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ OpenAI Functions](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36534635)

9. [Show HN: AI-Powered Twitter Filter](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39210964)

10. [Show HN: AI/ML Weekly Digest â€“ Curated by LLM, Summarized and Sentiment-Analyzed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37954932)

### AI Trends Summary

1. Managing updates for Large Language Models (LLMs) involves careful monitoring, data collection, and algorithm adjustments to enhance performance and accuracy, ensuring the models stay relevant and effective over time.
2. LLM hallucination refers to instances where these models generate false or nonsensical information, posing challenges for reliability and trustworthiness in their outputs.
3. Prompt engineering is a critical technique for influencing LLM output, where the design and phrasing of prompts can significantly guide the model's responses towards more accurate and relevant results.
4. The concept of attention in LLMs is crucial for their performance, as it allows the models to focus on relevant parts of the input data, leading to more coherent and context-aware outputs.
5. OpenAI's latest strategic move significantly impacts the AI field, suggesting major advancements or shifts in how AI technologies, particularly LLMs, are developed, deployed, or utilized, although the specific nature of this change is not detailed.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-03

### Top Stories

1. [You guys need to build more stupid shit](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45795704)

2. [LAP Coffee commotion puts German view of venture capital under scrutiny](https://www.ft.com/content/2b2bda15-afc2-496e-b48d-944c79d99cbf)

3. [The True Tale of Seattle's Sherlock Holmes](https://www.seattlemet.com/news-and-city-life/2025/09/real-detective-seattle-luke-may)

4. [Revival of the Chicago River](https://www.nationalgeographic.com/travel/article/what-to-do-along-the-chicago-river)

5. [Mamdani Has a Point About Rent Control](https://www.theatlantic.com/economy/archive/2025/11/mamdani-housing-rent-control/684790/)

6. [Why Every Family Needs a Code Word](https://www.wsj.com/tech/personal-tech/why-every-family-needs-a-code-word-e077ab76)

7. [Cara Menghubungi CS OCBC](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45795639)

8. [Why home sellers are rejecting buyers' love notes](https://sfstandard.com/2025/11/02/trouble-letter-home-sellers-rejecting-buyers-love-notes/)

9. [My previous post suggesting that China annex Singapore and Australia clearly](https://twitter.com/BeijingDai/status/1984973886287470602)

10. [When fintech startups outgrow their own controls, Linqto's collapse as a warning](https://capitalfolly.com/linqto-cutting-corners/)

### Summary

1. The call to "build more stupid shit" reflects a plea for innovation and creativity in the tech industry, urging developers and entrepreneurs to take risks and experiment with new, potentially groundbreaking ideas.

2. The incident involving LAP Coffee in Germany has sparked a debate on the country's perspective on venture capital, highlighting cultural attitudes towards entrepreneurship and investment in the tech sector.

3. "The True Tale of Seattle's Sherlock Holmes" delves into the intriguing story of a tech-savvy detective in Seattle, showcasing the intersection of technology and traditional detective work to solve complex cases.

4. The "Revival of the Chicago River" project emphasizes the role of technology and environmental engineering in urban renewal efforts, demonstrating how tech innovations can lead to significant improvements in city landscapes and ecosystems.

5. The commentary on Mamdani's views on rent control sheds light on the complex relationship between technology, housing, and economic policies, suggesting that tech solutions could play a role in addressing housing affordability challenges.
